text:
Message 336 of 4024
As you noted today, you are working while you try to do this. I would also note my whole world, everything I had worked for my entire life. My
unmutated reality, as dependable as the laws of gravity, imploded on July 5th. And now I have to completely start my whole life over again at 57.
Everything has been cast asunder and I start from scratch now.
Short of losing a kid or chemical burns over 80% of my body, this is my worst possible and unthinkable reality that I could have ever imagined. So
much so, that I am happy to make you a deal. Let's get through with all the treatment, all the therapy, I verify my sobriety for as long as I live, then
you quit your job. Travel the world, whatever you want.
But I get my soulmate and kids back and we are honest from now on with each other.
Sent:01/09/2024 at 05:19 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/09/2024 at 05:30 PM)
Subject:Re: I don't need to be soothed...
Message 337 of 4024
Emails like this make me feel very uncomfortable and triggered. Please stop.
Sent:01/09/2024 at 05:39 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/09/2024 at 05:39 PM)
Subject:Re: I don't need to be soothed...
Message 338 of 4024
Ok, I can respect that.
Can you also respect that when you say I’m not working, like I’m on easy street, it ain’t easy.
And tbh- I would not wish what has happened out of the blue to me in July on my worst enemy.
It’s almost unthinkably horrible and painful. I will never trust another human being as long as I live.
Sent:01/09/2024 at 05:44 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/09/2024 at 05:59 PM)
Subject:Re: I don't need to be soothed...
Message 339 of 4024
Ok... first off. I did not move anything into your path. Especially the brown cabinet. But I pushed some other stuff, also not moved and made room
to move it like you wanted.
Second, I told you several times across several platforms things may be a little undone. That I needed time to reorganize because it was happening in
the fly and they leave when they leave. I can send you numerous screen captures.
Third, I asked the kids be prepared for this. AD is asking why I would take all that stuff from the house. How can I ever use it. And the deck furniture
Sent:01/09/2024 at 07:01 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/09/2024 at 07:02 PM)
Subject:Moving to OFW
